ch0152_00_ryo/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Thanks for
stopping by today!
ch0152_00_ryo/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s keep on striving to be our very best selves!
ch0152_00_ryo/0601_0701_01_10:
You never know when or where you’ll run into a
rare Bug-type Pokémon.
ch0152_00_ryo/0601_0701_02_10:
That’s why in Sinnoh I made sure to have plenty of
Poké Balls on me at all times.
ch0152_00_ryo/0601_0701_03_10:
No matter what you’re doing, it’s important to be
prepared. That way you’ll have no regrets!
ch0152_00_ryo/0602_0701_01_10: When I was a kid, I really wanted to be an adult.
ch0152_00_ryo/0602_0701_02_10:
I was so eager to grow up, I’d sleep with my
blankets wrapped around me like a cocoon.
ch0152_00_ryo/0602_0701_03_10:
I thought maybe I’d wake up in the morning as a
fully formed butterfly Pokémon.
ch0152_00_ryo/0603_0701_01_10:
The people and Pokémon on Pasio have come
from all over the world, so it’s no surprise that
they’re all so different and unique.
ch0152_00_ryo/0603_0701_02_10:
Sometimes Trainers will challenge me, but then I
realize they actually want to compete to see which
of our Pokémon is the cutest or coolest!
ch0152_00_ryo/0603_0701_03_10:
I’ve learned that there are a lot of different ways
to compete with Pokémon.
ch0152_00_ryo/0604_0701_02_10:
Hm? Do you think I’m saying that all other types of
Pokémon are inferior?
ch0152_00_ryo/0604_0701_03_10: No, that’s not what I mean at all.
ch0152_00_ryo/0604_0701_04_10:
I just say that to affirm my own love for
bug Pokémon!
ch0152_00_ryo/0605_0701_01_10:
For some reason, I really want to cheer you
on, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0152_00_ryo/0605_0701_02_10:
There’s something about you that makes me
believe you’ll grow even stronger.
ch0152_00_ryo/0605_0701_03_10: Maybe that’s what they call talent?
ch0152_00_ryo/1701_0701_02_10: It’s a special present just for you!
ch0152_00_ryo/1701_0702_01_10: Be sure to use that present I gave you wisely!
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0701_01_10:
I never get tired of watching bug Pokémon grow
up and mature.
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0701_02_10:
They have so many different Evolutions, and every
one of them is beautiful.
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0701_03_10: I never get tired of watching you, either!
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0701_04_10:
’Cause every time I see you, you show me how
much stronger you’ve become!
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0702_01_10: When I look at you, I see countless possibilities.
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0702_02_10: So I sometimes wonder how you view yourself.
ch0152_00_ryo/2501_0702_03_10:
I hope to keep watching you grow and realize
your full potential, all from right here by your side!
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0701_01_10:
You amaze me all the time,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0701_02_10:
Whether it’s your skill in battle or the way you
interact with your partner Pokémon, I’m always
so impressed.
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0701_03_10:
When I was a kid, I used to run around in the tall
grass just chasing bug Pokémon. I had such a pure
heart back then!
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0701_04_10: You remind me of how I was at that time.
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to keep up my enthusiasm, and in order to
do that...
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0702_02_10:
I spend time around amazing bug Pokémon that I
feel enthusiastic about!
ch0152_00_ryo/2511_0702_03_10:
And since you make me feel just as enthused as
they do, I’d like to spend time with you as well!
ch0152_00_ryo/3001_0701_01_10:
Ready for an adventure? Let’s get out there and
find some awesome bug Pokémon!
ch0152_00_ryo/3003_0701_01_10:
I think I’ll go for a walk today to gather up some
of my bug Pokémon’s favorite leaves and grass.
Care to join me?
ch0152_00_ryo/3005_0701_01_10:
If you listen really closely at night when the air
is still, you might hear the chorus of bug Pokémon
all around you.
